title: Creating Animated Plots with Matplotlib
description: Matplotlib is a data visualization library used to create static, animated, and interactive visualizations in Python. In this lab, we will learn how to create an animated plot using Matplotlib. We will use the FuncAnimation class to create an animation of a decaying sine wave.

meta.title: Matplotlib | Python Data Visualization | Animated Plots
meta.description: Learn how to create animated plots using Matplotlib, a powerful data visualization library in Python. Explore the FuncAnimation class and create a decaying sine wave animation.
meta.keywords: Matplotlib, Python, Data Visualization, Animation, FuncAnimation, Sine Wave

Мы будем использовать класс FuncAnimation для создания анимации затухающего синусоидального колебания.

meta.keywords: Matplotlib, Python, Визуализация данных, Анимация, FuncAnimation, Синусоидальное колебание
